mqtt.title: MQTT Server
mqtt.description: Defines the hostname or IP of the MQTT broker to connect to for MQTT-based automation. If not set, MQTT support is not started.

portmqtt.title: MQTT Port
portmqtt.description: The port of the MQTT broker.

tlsmqtt.title: MQTT TLS
tlsmqtt.description: Use TLS to connect to the MQTT broker.

usermqtt.title: MQTT Username
usermqtt.description: The username used to connect to your MQTT broker. If not set, no authentication is used.

passmqtt.title: MQTT Password
passmqtt.description: The password used to connect to your MQTT broker. If not set, no authentication is used.
